author.bio: I am an experienced front-end engineer based in Bangalore, now passionately learning both front and back of the web. My favorite technologies are React.js, SCSS, Gatsby, TypeScript, Node.js, GraphQL and Next.js. I am more focused on creating useful software, using the technologies I know, that will help people.
